metadata.name: Sacred Waters
metadata.description:
Canon EOS R5
Canon RF 24-70mm f/2.8
4k slow motion video
Sound recorded at location

Sequence by: David Lennard

I came across this stream while out hiking one morning close to V Bar V Heritage site, the largest known petroglyph site in Arizona's Verde Valley, as well as being one of the best-preserved. The stream eventually makes its way to the site.

I drank the cool water, and said a prayer for the ancient tribes that once irrigated their corn crop and carried water from this very stream.
